title: Shop-n-Pay
description: Fully scalable, one-stop e-commerce platform from sales to payment. Tech: React.js, Redux, Node.js, Stripe API

title: Mini Fridge
description: A cloud service for your files similar to DropBox and Amazon Drive. Tech: React.js, Node.js, MongoDB

title: Payment Portal
description: Online payment portal for e-commerce service. Tech: React.js, Redux, Node.js, Stripe API

title: Hospital surgery cost map
description: Find how much hospitals near you charge for different types of surgery in this map interactive.

title: Does my Congress rep support Affordable Care Act?
description: In this interactive app, find out which congressional district have high rates of uninsured who are eligible for health insurance due to the Affordable Care Act, but has a House rep that opposes key parts of the law.

title: Visualizing corporate interests of Trump staffers
description: Using data from ProPublica, I created an interactive plot showing the connections that staffers in the Trump administration have to corporations, lobbying firms, and more.

title: Enterprise Analytics Dashboard
description: This modern dashboard interface lets you visualize your business’s trends and analytics. Tech: React.js, Chart.js, Node.js, MongoDB Atlas.

title: Hello SMS
description: Send a text message from your browser to someone’s phone. Can adapt to build phone notifications or automated replies for customers. Tech: Python, Flask, Twilio API

title: Shrink My Link
description: A URL shortener like Bitly that spits out short urls which redirect to their original websites. Tech: React.js, Node.js, MongoDB.
